name: Out Of Order (MatK)
description:
Press 'e' near a terminal to enter it, click map pieces to slide them around, and then press 'e' again to get back into the gameplay. Map is randomized on startup. 

NOTE: When clicking tiles to slide them, you need to click on an empty spot on that tile (clicking on the textured part of tiles will not work :/). Global Game Jam 2020 entry.
